title: 129: The Poetic Edda: "Odin's Pickled Head"
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: The Poetic Edda are the primary source for most of our information on Norse Mythology. They also happen to be the most heavy-metal myths you've ever heard. Half-corpse god of Hell named "Hel"? Yes, please.
itunes:author: Mimir, Fenrir, and Freyja
itunes:subtitle: Mimir does well in brine
itunes:summary: The Poetic Edda are the primary source for most of our information on Norse Mythology. They also happen to be the most heavy-metal myths you've ever heard. Half-corpse god of Hell named "Hel"? Yes, please.
itunes:title: 129 - The Poetic Edda - "Odin's Pickled Head"
